title: Ulaire Lemenya, Winged Hunter (6U86)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Minion • Nazgul
Strength:	9
Vitality:	2
Site:	3
Game Text:	Regroup: Exert Ulaire Lemenya and discard 3 cards from hand to return a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to owner's hand.
Lore:	”…the helpless horror that had come with the cry in the wind and the shadow on the moon….”
Rarity:	U
